title: Update failed. Please help!!
body: Hello. I have a problem. I tried to update the game when it arrived. But it says Update failed, unspecified error occurred. I dont know what to do, sometimes it says my files are corrupted.

replies.body:
If you're seeing a corrupt files error when patching, you'll probably want to force a repatch to ensure the files are replaced properly. You can accomplish this by grabbing the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and checking the box for *Force Repatch* before hitting *Start*. 

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
